products.name: Straight Channel Chip
products.baseDescription: Simple straight channel chip for basic flow experiments and mixing applications. Perfect for educational purposes and basic research.

products.name: X-Junction Chip
products.baseDescription: Cross-junction chip design enabling complex mixing patterns and droplet generation. Ideal for droplet-based microfluidics.

products.name: T-Junction Chip
products.baseDescription: T-junction chip for controlled droplet generation and segmented flow applications.

products.name: Meander Chip
products.baseDescription: Extended channel length in compact form factor for increased residence time and mixing efficiency.

products.name: Standard Chip Holder
products.baseDescription: Universal chip holder compatible with all standard chip sizes. Features secure mounting and easy fluid connections.

products.name: Premium Tubing Set
products.baseDescription: High-quality PTFE tubing set with various inner diameters. Chemical resistant and pressure-rated.

products.name: Precision Syringe Pump
products.baseDescription: High-precision syringe pump with accurate flow rate control and multiple syringe compatibility.

products.name: PTFE Tubing 1/16" OD
products.baseDescription: PTFE (Teflon) tubing for microfluidics, 1/16" (1.6 mm) outer diameter. Chemically inert, flexible, and suitable for low-pressure applications.

products.name: PEEK Tubing 1/16" OD
products.baseDescription: PEEK tubing for microfluidics, 1/16" (1.6 mm) outer diameter. Chemically resistant, rigid, and suitable for high-pressure applications.
